title: STAT+: As Republicans face attacks for cutting Medicaid funding, Dr. Oz blames states with big cities
description: The Trump admin is reframing steep Medicaid cuts to pit states with large urban centers against those with large rural populations.
content: The Trump admin is reframing steep Medicaid cuts to pit states with large urban centers against those with large rural populations.
